response.overview: The chronicles of four years in the life of Julie, a young woman who navigates the troubled waters of her love life and struggles to find her career path, leading her to take a realistic look at who she really is.
response.title: The Worst Person in the World

release_dates.note: Festival du nouveau cinéma de Montréal
